extendedInfo.description: Finally, the complete NASCAR app is here, NEWS, AUDIO, VIDEO, LIVE, and HISTORY. Everything NASCAR in one APP: â¢ LIVE RACE RESULTS - Updated every 2-3 minutes during races â¢ COMPLETE HISTORY OF NASCAR - Races, Drivers, Tracks.  Every race ever run. â¢ DRIVER PROFILES - including Facebook and Twitter updates â¢ RACE AUDIO - live race audio during the race â¢ VIDEO HIGHLIGHTS - view the highlights of each and every race â¢Â NASCAR NEWS - news from many different media outlets. â¢Â TALK NASCAR - Enjoy the company of other race fans in our custom message board as the race is going on.  Share race experiences. â¢ EVERYTHING BUT THE KITCHEN SINK - Full coverage of Nationwide Series and Sprint Cup racing.  With this app you will be the authority on Nascar.  Who won the Grand National in 1953?  How many races did Richard Petty win?  How many championships did Dale Earnhardt win?   All these are easy to look up and find. There is so much more that we cannot contain in the little area here to describe.  Just download and have fun.Get the complete package with LIVE RACE RESULTS and past race results.

reviews.comment: Worked for about 20 mins then I got a black screen and it kept forcing closed.
reviews.author: A Google User
